analyzed: dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro glu dam pa'i srid pa sgrub par byed pa /

analyzed: aa la la la la ho bde ba chen po rab tu dgyes pa'i gar mdzod cig / nyi ma'i 'od kyis padma kha rab 'byed pa bzhin //

analyzed: bde ba chen po rab tu dgyes pa'i gar mdzod cig / ces pa'i glu 'dis rdo rje sems dpa' bslang ste /

analyzed: mi'i rus pa'i rgyan can /

analyzed: mig la aom dkar po /

original: rna ba la aa dmar po /
analyzed: rna ba la aa dmar po /

original: 'di ni go cha drug go //
analyzed: 'di ni go cha drug go //

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa dbu la bzhugs pa sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs pa chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa dbu la bzhugs pa sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs pa chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
